Development

Getting Started

Learn how to set up the development environment and start building

npm install
npm run dev

Asset Pipeline

Automated image optimization and distribution system

npm run distribute-assets
npm run optimize-assets

Component System

Using the reusable component library

import { Hero, Navigation } from './src/components';
